info.title: Navigate to the next radio button in interaction mode

setupScript.name: setFocusOnFirstRadioButton
setupScript.description: sets focus on the first radio button

user: With focus on the 'Regular crust' radio button, navigate to the next radio button.
instructions.raw: With focus on the 'Regular crust' radio button, navigate to the next radio button.
instructions.mode: If NVDA did not make the focus mode sound when the test page loaded, press Insert+Space to turn focus mode on.

assertions.expectation: State of the radio button, 'checked', is conveyed
Position of the radio button, 2, is conveyed
Number of radio buttons in the group, 3, is conveyed
